mapper.select: SELECT UserID, Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, Displayname, Username, imageURL, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Stage, FollowCount, CancerType, metastasis, Age, Password, geneticMutation, deviceToken, phone FROM user WHERE user.Username = #{username}

SELECT UserID, password, Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, Displayname, Username, ImageURL, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Stage, FollowCount, CancerType, metastasis, Age, geneticMutation, deviceToken, phone, IsSuperUser FROM user WHERE user.phone = #{phone}

SELECT UserID, password, Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, Displayname, Username, ImageURL, Gender, IsSmoking, Pathological, Stage, FollowCount, CancerType, metastasis, Age, geneticMutation, deviceToken, phone, IsSuperUser FROM user WHERE user.Email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (Username,Displayname,Password,Email, CreateDate, UpdateDate, FollowCount, CancerType, Pathological, Stage, IsSmoking, metastasis, Gender, Age, userType, geneticMutation, deviceToken, phone) VALUES (#{username},#{displayname},#{password},#{email},#{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{followCount}, #{cancerType}, #{pathological}, #{stage}, #{isSmoking}, #{metastasis}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{userType}, #{geneticMutation}, #{deviceToken}, #{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET EMAIL = #{email}, DISPLAYNAME = #{displayname}, UpdateDate = #{updateDate}, Gender = #{gender}, IsSmoking = #{isSmoking}, Pathological = #{pathological}, Stage = #{stage}, CancerType = #{cancerType}, metastasis = #{metastasis}, Age = #{age}, phone = #{phone}, geneticMutation = #{geneticMutation}, deviceToken = #{deviceToken} WHERE username = #{username}
